description: Non-Material Amendment to approved permission 4411/21:  Amended Plans. (summary)
decision_conditions: in accordance with plans:  882-200-L-002 Rev A (Proposed Ground Floor Plan - including site); 882-200-L-102 Rev A (Proposed First Floor); 882-200-L-X04 Rev C (Proposed West Elevation); 882-200-L-X03 Rev C (Proposed East Elevation); 882-200-L-X02 Rev C (Proposed Rear Elevation); 882-200-L-X01 Rev D (Proposed Front Elevation); 3139-ACA-XX-01-DR-A-1111 V13 (General Arrangement L01); 3139-ACA-XX-OO-DR-A-1110 V13 (General Arrangement L00); 3139-ACA-XX-XX-DR-A-2104 V13 (General Arrangement South Elevation 04); 3139-ACA-XX-XX-DR-A-2103 V13 (General Arrangement North Elevation-03); 3139-ACA-XX-XX-DR-A-2102 V13 (General Arrangement East Elevation-02); 3139-ACA-XX-XX-DR-A-2101 V13 (General Arrangement West Elevation-01); Non-material amendment Design and Access Statement 888 High Road (January 2024); Transport Statement Addendum dated January 2024 Ref: 2023/7291/TSA05; Cover letter dated 15 January 2024
